name: Shadcn Localizations Extensions
description: Formatting helpers for localized dates, times, durations, and picker labels.

use: you need date/time formatting helpers tied to `ShadcnLocalizations`.
you want picker labels for months, weekdays, and color modes.
avoid: you need full ICU formatting (use `intl` directly).

examples.minimal:
final strings = ShadcnLocalizations.of(context);
final label = strings.formatDateTime(DateTime.now());

accessibility: Keep localized labels clear and consistent with user expectations.
do: Use locale-aware labels in pickers and calendars.
dont: Hardcode month/day labels when localization is required.
